content: TE 1000-AVR TE-S Demolition hammer Versatile breaker for demolishing or chiseling floors and occasional wall applications (with universal power cord) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Demolition hammers and breakers- - - ### FEATURES:Features High versatility – in-line design for floor breaking and ergonomic side handle for occasional wall breaking Maintenance-free brushless SR motor and triple-chamber lubrication systems for longer service intervals and tool lifetime Exceptionally low tool vibration due to Hilti AVR sub-chassis (Active Vibration Reduction) system Detachable supply cord for fast and easy replacement of damaged/broken supply cords on the jobsite Optional TE DRS-B dust removal system, which collects up to 95% of dust Applications Demolishing concrete and masonry at floor level or below waist level Renovating floors of all kinds Removing tiles, bushing and compacting Corrective chiseling, such as adjustments to door and window openings ### TECHNICAL DATA: Working direction: Floor, Wall Tool chuck type: TE-S Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery: 27.6 lb. Technical Data | Working direction | Floor, Wall | Tool chuck type | TE-S | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 27.6 lb | Single impact energy | 19.2 ft-lbs | Full hammering frequency | 1950 impacts/minute | Max. chiseling performance | 476 in³/min | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 28 x 5.6 x 12 in | Triaxial vibration for chiseling into concrete | 5.9 m/s² | 1 | Dust removal system available | TE DRS-B | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 88 dB (A) | 2 | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3523418 - TE 1000-AVR Performance Pkg Mix - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 1000-AVR 120V Breaker - 1x TE Standard Supply Cord 13 (4m) - 1x TE SH-STD 2 Comfort side handle - 1x TE 1000-AVR Tool case assy - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 1x Pointed chisel TE-SX SM 36 - 1x Flat chisel TE-SX FM 36 - 1x TE Standard Supply Cord 13 (4m) - 3856310 - TE 1000-AVR Performance Pkg Flat - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 1000-AVR 120V Breaker - 1x TE Standard Supply Cord 13 (4m) - 1x TE SH-STD 2 Comfort side handle - 1x TE 1000-AVR Tool case assy - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 2x Flat chisel TE-SX FM 36 - 1x TE Standard Supply Cord 13 (4m) - 3856311 - TE 1000-AVR Performance Pkg Point - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 1000-AVR 120V Breaker - 1x TE Standard Supply Cord 13 (4m) - 1x TE SH-STD 2 Comfort side handle - 1x TE 1000-AVR Tool case assy - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 2x Pointed chisel TE-SX SM 36 - 1x TE Standard Supply Cord 13 (4m) - 3856312 - TE 1000-AVR Performance Pkg Scaling - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 1000-AVR 120V Breaker - 1x TE Standard Supply Cord 13 (4m) - 1x TE SH-STD 2 Comfort side handle - 1x TE 1000-AVR Tool case assy - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 2x Scaling chisel TE-SX SC 43/8 - 1x TE Standard Supply Cord 13 (4m) - 2167733 - Breaker TE 1000-AVR 120V univ cord - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 1000-AVR 120V Breaker - 1x TE Standard Supply Cord 13 (4m) - 1x TE SH-STD 2 Comfort side handle - 1x TE 1000-AVR Tool case assy -
